an8.119:4.1: “For insight into greed, eight things should be developed.
an8.119:4.3: Perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly. Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.119:4.4: Perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly.  …
an8.119:4.5: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly. …
an8.119:4.6: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly. …
an8.119:4.7: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, blue, blue colored, blue in appearance, shining blue. … yellow …
an8.119:4.9: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, white, white colored, white in appearance, shining white.
an8.119:4.10: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.119:4.11: For insight into greed, these eight things should be developed.”
